passage: The radiation that ______ blank during the decay of radioactive atomic nuclei is known as gamma radiation.
question_text: Which choice completes the text so that it conforms to the conventions of Standard English?

answer_rationales.A: Choice A is the best answer. The convention being tested is subject-verb agreement. The singular verb "occurs" agrees in number with the singular subject "radiation."
answer_rationales.B: Choice B is incorrect because the plural verb "have occurred" doesn't agree in number with the singular subject "radiation."
answer_rationales.C: Choice C is incorrect because the plural verb "occur" doesn't agree in number with the singular subject "radiation."
answer_rationales.D: Choice D is incorrect because the plural verb "are occurring" doesn't agree in number with the singular subject "radiation."
